(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT The) (JJ last) (NN time))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP Penang)))))))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (ADVP
          (NP (RB almost) (CD 30) (NNS years))
          (RB ago))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (NN time))
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD ate)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (NNP Penang) (NN food))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (ADVP (IN around)
                (NP (DT that) (NN time)))
              (ADVP (RB too)))))))
    (. .)))


det(time-3, The-1)
amod(time-3, last-2)
nsubj(was-8, time-3)
nsubj(was-5, I-4)
rcmod(time-3, was-5)
prep(was-5, in-6)
pobj(in-6, Penang-7)
root(ROOT-0, was-8)
advmod(years-11, almost-9)
num(years-11, 30-10)
npadvmod(ago-12, years-11)
advmod(was-8, ago-12)
cc(was-8, and-13)
det(time-16, the-14)
amod(time-16, last-15)
nsubj(ate-18, time-16)
nsubj(ate-18, I-17)
conj(was-8, ate-18)
nn(food-20, Penang-19)
nsubj(was-21, food-20)
ccomp(ate-18, was-21)
advmod(was-21, around-22)
det(time-24, that-23)
pobj(around-22, time-24)
advmod(was-21, too-25)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Oh)
      (NP (RB yes)))
    (, ,)))

pobj(Oh-1, yes-2)

  (S
    (NP (NN everyone))
    (VP (VBZ says)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (NNP Penang) (NN food))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (RB so) (JJ great))))))
    (, ,)))

ccomp(says-2, great-8)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (DT the) (NN problem))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
            (VP (VB get)
              (NP (JJ great) (NNS Penang))
              (ADVP (RB readily))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Singapore))
                  (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                    (SBAR (IN so)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP they))
                        (VP (VBP say))))
                    (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))))
    (. .)))

det(problem-3, the-2)
nsubj(is-4, problem-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
nsubj(get-8, you-5)
aux(get-8, ca-6)
neg(get-8, n't-7)
ccomp(is-4, get-8)
amod(Penang-10, great-9)
dobj(get-8, Penang-10)
advmod(get-8, readily-11)
prep(get-8, in-12)
pobj(in-12, Singapore-13)
mark(say-17, so-15)
nsubj(say-17, they-16)
dep(Singapore-13, say-17)

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (JJ sourish))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN taste))))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBN derived)
          (PP (IN from)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NNP Kembong) (NN Fish))
              (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                (S
                  (NP (JJ Small) (NN fish))
                  (ADJP (JJ akin)
                    (PP (TO to)
                      (NP (DT the) (NNP Selar)))))
                (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))
    (. .)))

  (S

      (SBAR (IN that)

            (ADVP (RB usually))
            (VP (VBZ finds)
              (S
                (NP (NNP Penang) (NNP Laksa))
                (ADJP (RB too) (JJ sourish)))))
          (CC but)
          (S
            (NP (DT this) (NN one))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB well))
              (VP (VBN balanced)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB please))
    (VP
      (VP (VB give)
        (NP (DT this))
        (NP (DT a) (NN try)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB let)
        (S
          (NP (PRP us))
          (VP (VB know)
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP what))
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP think))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (SINV
    (PP (IN like)
      (NP (DT the) (NNP Singapore) (NN version)))
    (VP (VBZ is))
    (NP
      (NP (DT a)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ simple))
        (NN dish))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (NP
              (NP (NN flash) (NNS fried))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN lard))
                  (CC and)
                  (NP (DT some) (NN soy) (NN sauce\/fish) (NN sauce)))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT A) (NN lot))
    (VP (VBZ depends)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN skill))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN hawker))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP who))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ needs)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB control)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN wok) (NN fire))
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB get)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT the) (JJ perfect) (NN texture))
                                  (PP (IN for)
                                    (NP (DT the) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (ADJP (JJ Good) (RB enough)
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (PRP him)))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB bring)
            (NP (PRP$ his) (NN wife))
            (ADVP (RB back))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB taste)
                  (NP (PRP it)))))))))
    (. .)))
